name: SkateBIRD x JAZZ MICKLE's Pro Cap Wearer do a Spoopy Combo
name_original: SkateBIRD x JAZZ MICKLE's Pro Cap Wearer do a Spoopy Combo
description:
Welcome to SkateBIRD x JAZZ MICKLE's Pro Cap Wearer do a Spoopy Combo, the Next Generation in Skateboarding / Fashion / Avian / Dress-up / Videogame technology.

Enter a WORLD of customization with:
* Over 26 hats!
* Multiple Color Options!
* Logos!
* Various Birds!

Created in Radical collaboration with the creators of SkateBIRD, Pro Cap Wearer now lets your favourite bird hang around wearing Cool Hats,,,
